text:
country which owns some sub-entities in the country or abroad:
(a) Is it mandatory for the group to report datapoints per legal entity, or is it only in the case
of variation / impact materially that a specific entity detail shall be reported?
(b) If the group reports only aggregated data at the group level, does it mean that a specific
legal entity (in the EU) will be able to share ‘only’ group datapoints and not the specific
information related to its legal entity?
